voice.title: Voice Clone
voice.goToVoiceLibrary: Go to voice library and add some of your favorite voices

voiceClone.title: Create Custom Voice Model
voiceClone.referenceTextReal: Please read this text as your voice sample. Make sure to read clearly in a quiet environment for the best voice cloning effect.
voiceClone.tooShort: Audio is too short, please record again
voiceClone.uploadAudioDesc: Upload audio file (minimum 10 seconds, maximum 40 seconds, recommended 25 seconds)
voiceClone.referenceTextRealDesc: The water cycle is the natural cycle system of the earth, water evaporates from the ground, forms clouds, and then returns to the ground in the form of rain. This cycle process is crucial for life on earth.
voiceClone.tooLong: Audio is too long, please record again

create.takelong: The model takes a long time to generate
create.backgroundPrompt: Please enter the background modification requirements, e.g., change the background to outdoor
create.title: Create Work
create.uploadAudioPlaceholder: Click or drag files here to upload
create.uploadAudioDescription: Supports MP3, M4A, WAV formats, duration 5-1800 seconds
create.promptPlaceholder: Please describe the digital human's actions or posture requirements e.g. The person is talking eloquently, camera fixed

avatar.picDeleteDesc: A digital human needs to retain at least one image asset.
avatar.referenceCharacterDescription: Only reference facial features, will not generate the same face.
avatar.referenceThemeDescription: Only reference theme, background and style, will not generate the same background.
avatar.extractFirstFrameToImageMaterial: Extract first frame to image material
avatar.text1: Wearing a clean and sharp business suit, with neat hair, upright features, a professional smile at the corner of the lips, approachable temperament, standing in a spacious and bright modern office area, with desks, chairs and computers faintly visible behind.
avatar.text2: Wearing an elegant shirt or simple sweater, gentle image, with a natural and neat hairstyle, sitting in front of a simply arranged bookshelf, surrounded by a few books and green plants. Hands naturally placed on the table, body slightly leaning forward, looking forward attentively, with a kind expression, giving people a feeling of patient explanation.
avatar.text3: Wearing a formal shirt with dark long pants, clean and neat appearance, bright eyes, standing in a tech-savvy virtual studio with a blue gradient and electronic screens in the background. Maintaining an upright posture, hands gently clasped in front of the abdomen, facing the camera directly, with a focused expression.
avatar.text4: Wearing a simple sports hoodie and dark sports pants, with a neat and stylish hairstyle, sitting on a bench in a bright and clean gym, surrounded by dumbbells and yoga mats. Hands slightly crossed on legs, back straight, presenting a vibrant image.
avatar.text5: Wearing a beige suit, short hair exquisitely neat, eyes showing confidence and capability, standing in a modern corporate conference room with tall floor-to-ceiling windows letting in natural light.
avatar.text6: Wearing cotton and linen style loose tops and long pants, long black hair loosely tied up, expression quiet and gentle, sitting quietly in a corner of a bright and clean tea room, with exquisite tea sets placed beside. Left hand gently supporting the cup, right hand occasionally gently stirring the tea leaves, with elegant temperament, the overall picture is quiet, warm and full of oriental charm.
avatar.text7: Wearing a white T-shirt with a knit cardigan and jeans, refreshing hairstyle, relaxed and happy expression, sitting on a modern style living room sofa, with coffee table, books and a cup of hot coffee in the background, creating a warm atmosphere. Body sitting straight but natural, one hand on the sofa armrest, the other hand casually making interactive gestures, tone and movements appear relaxed and comfortable.
avatar.text8: Wearing a light blue knit cardigan with light-colored jeans, curly hair naturally falling, with a gentle smile, sitting at a simple and bright kitchen dining table with fresh fruits and drinks on the table. Hands naturally crossed on the table, occasionally picking up a fruit for demonstration during explanation, with gentle movements, creating an intimate and daily atmosphere.
avatar.text9: Hands gently clasped in front of the body, maintaining an upright posture, occasionally raising hands to describe product highlights, with elegant and powerful movements, full of professionalism. Wearing a simple sports hoodie and dark sports pants, with a neat and stylish hairstyle, sitting on a bench in a bright and clean gym, surrounded by dumbbells and yoga mats. Hands slightly crossed on legs, back straight, presenting a vibrant image.
